name: GIMP Massive Package
short_description:
GIMP for Windows and Mac with a huge amount of Open Source or otherwise free or public domain plugins. windows version has installer. mac version must be assembled but has zip files.

This package is not officially associated with the GIMP project. I just make this package available for people who need it.

I also included brushes, gradients, patterns.

GIMP 2.8.2 has come out, but it uses GEGL entirely for plugins. because of this, no new version of gimpmp will be released until working, migrated plugins are released (otherwise,no reason to release). so essentially this project is waiting for everybody else. if you just want latest GIMP, download it from projects below.

Donations should go to http://sf.net/projects/gimponosx and http://projects/gimp-win
summary: GIMP Massive Package for Windows and Mac, tons of plugins and extras
